tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceReminders (
    reminder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
    maintenance_task TEXT NOT NULL,
    mileage_interval INT,
    time_interval INTERVAL NOT NULL,
    last_notified_at TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE reminders (id INT PRIMARY KEY, task_name TEXT, interval_type TEXT, interval_value INT, last_sent_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE vehicles (vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_name TEXT, mileage INT, last_maintenance_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_task VARCHAR(255),
    mileage_completed INT,
    date_completed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reminders(
  reminder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID,
  reminder_type VARCHAR(255),
  mileage_interval INT,
  time_interval INTERVAL,
  last_reminder_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    reminder_type VARCHAR(50),
    mileage_interval INT,
    time_interval INTERVAL,
    last_reminder_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    last_mileage INT
);
